department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: Janitorial and Commercial Cleaning Services at the Embassy of Canada to Indonesia
description: The purpose of this RFP is to select a supplier to enter into a contract with the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) to provide cleaning services. Estimated quantity of commodity: ServicesDuration of contract: (2022-12) to (2024-12)Time frame of delivery: (2022-12) to (2024-12)
